spec.name: Hourly aggregation
spec.query:
import "date"



startOfToday = today()
startOfTomorrow = date.add(d: 1d, to: startOfToday)

from(bucket: "seconds")
    |> range(start: startOfToday)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "environment_bme280")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature_celsius")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "temperature_celsius_mean", _time: startOfTomorrow}))
    |> to(bucket: "daily")

from(bucket: "seconds")
    |> range(start: startOfToday)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "environment_bme280")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature_celsius")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "temperature_celsius_median", _time: startOfTomorrow}))
    |> to(bucket: "daily")

from(bucket: "seconds")
    |> range(start: startOfToday)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "environment_bme280")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature_celsius")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: spread, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "temperature_celsius_stddev", _time: startOfTomorrow}))
    |> to(bucket: "daily")

from(bucket: "seconds")
    |> range(start: startOfToday)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "environment_bme280")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pressure_hpa")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "pressure_hpa_mean", _time: startOfTomorrow}))
    |> to(bucket: "daily")

from(bucket: "seconds")
    |> range(start: startOfToday)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "environment_bme280")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pressure_hpa")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "pressure_hpa_median", _time: startOfTomorrow}))
    |> to(bucket: "daily")

from(bucket: "seconds")
    |> range(start: startOfToday)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "environment_bme280")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pressure_hpa")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: spread, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "pressure_hpa_stddev", _time: startOfTomorrow}))
    |> to(bucket: "daily")

from(bucket: "seconds")
    |> range(start: startOfToday)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "environment_bme280")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "humidity_percent")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "humidity_percent_mean", _time: startOfTomorrow}))
    |> to(bucket: "daily")

from(bucket: "seconds")
    |> range(start: startOfToday)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "environment_bme280")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "humidity_percent")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: median, createEmpty: false)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "humidity_percent_median", _time: startOfTomorrow}))
    |> to(bucket: "daily")

from(bucket: "seconds")
    |> range(start: startOfToday)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "environment_bme280")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "humidity_percent")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: spread, createEmpty: false)

    |> to(bucket: "daily")
